fields.description:
h6.Reproduce
1. Run the simple app attached in an alloy project
2. On force touch of "Open Window" button.
3. Another window should be opened. But on force touch of button, peek event is not getting fired. 

h6.Note
Same issue with 6.1.0.GA 6.1.1.GA
But working well on 6.0.3.GA
fields.summary: iOS: Peek and Pop functionality not working with 6.1.0 G.A and above

comments.body: The issue was introduced by the fixing the analyser-warnings ([this line|https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/commit/46e83b20895f110fbf0b6adcf93edd84968c4ec9#diff-e1073c3ff26a35a5c8da1098e5020788R87]). PR ready later today. Might be worth a 6.1.3!

Passed FR.
Fix found in SDK versions:
6.2.0.v20170815151205
7.0.0.v20170815144954
